items.title: Household bills will rise to fund £28bn investment in energy network
items.description: Ofgem says the investment will help lower reliance on imported gas and make wholesale energy cheaper.

items.title: Root's first ton in Australia keeps England afloat
items.description: Joe Root finally makes a century in Australia to keep England afloat on a riveting first day of the second Ashes Test in Brisbane.

items.title: Crypto investor donates record £9m to Reform UK
items.description: The sum from Christopher Harborne is the largest ever single donation by a living person to a British political party.

items.title: Hospitals facing unprecedented flu season, say NHS bosses
items.description: Record number of patients in hospital in England with flu for this time of year, figures show.

items.title: UK and Norway form naval alliance to hunt Russian submarines
items.description: The partnership is designed to protect undersea cables, which Western officials say are increasingly under threat from Moscow.
